"JE Bennett Law is a private client law firm which specialises in providing legal services to the vulnerable client. We pride ourselves on our holistic approach to our clients’ needs."

- Jane Bennett, Senior Partner

Our core business areas

Vulnerable client law

Our wealth of experience enables us to represent vulnerable clients with a range of injuries and disabilities; or concerns arising from getting older. We also assist their family members and in many cases, are involved for the duration of the vulnerable party’s life.

Read more

Expert witness

Jane Bennett acts as an expert witness in catastrophic high value insurance claims for a range of leading claimant and defendant law firms across England and Wales, regarding the role of a professional property and affairs deputy under the Court of Protection, and associated issues such as costs; health and welfare; best interests and safeguarding aspects.

Read more

Working with Local Authorities

JE Bennett Law has very close links with a growing number of local authorities in the South and South East. Our work is focussed on the provision of key Court of Protection or power of attorney-related advice at often crucial moments in the service user’s pathway.

Read more

Working for the family of those lacking mental capacity, the injured party, the elderly and other vulnerable groups

See all the people we can help

Helping vulnerable people to get the legal help they need

Read our client stories

JE Bennett Law is recognised as a leading firm by The Legal 500 and Jane Bennett as a recommended lawyer.

Jane has been described as having a "superb grasp of Court of Protection practice and procedure" and the team as being "excellent".

JE Bennett Law is a Limited company incorporated in England and Wales (No.7875908), and is authorised and regulated by the Solicitors Regulation Authority (No.565975)
